title: What is an essential business in 10 US cities - Washington Post
description: Every city is keeping grocery stores open. Only a few are doing the same for marijuana dispensaries.
content:
Under an emergency hunker down order from Mayor Ethan Berkowitz (until March 31). 
In terms of the triggers for what's inspiring my actions, its really pretty simple. What were trying to do is just save lives. The sooner we act, the more we can do it.Mayor B… [+9077 chars]
